feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Welcoming Fellows and Summer Students
entry.content: Welcoming a research fellow Julia Balla and three Summer students, Nicholas Ho, Satvik Tripathi, and Isuru Herath.
entry.summary: Welcoming a research fellow Julia Balla and three Summer students, Nicholas Ho, Satvik Tripathi, and Isuru Herath.

entry.title: Broadly Generalizable Pre-Training Approach
entry.content: Excited to share a preprint on self-supervised method for pre-training. Project website with evaluation on eight datasets, including electrodiagnostic testing, human daily activity recognition, and health state monitoring.
entry.summary: Excited to share a preprint on self-supervised method for pre-training. Project website with evaluation on eight datasets, including electrodiagnostic testing, human daily activity recognition, and health state monitoring.

entry.title: Welcoming New Postdocs
entry.content: Excited to welcome George Dasoulas and Huan He, new postdocs joining us this Summer.
entry.summary: Excited to welcome George Dasoulas and Huan He, new postdocs joining us this Summer.

entry.title: George Named the 2022 Wojcicki Troper Fellow

link.title: George Named the 2022 Wojcicki Troper Fellow

entry.content: Congratulations to George Dasoulas, our incoming postdoctoral fellow, on being named the 2022 Wojcicki Troper HDSI Postdoctoral Fellow. We are delighted to welcome George in our group.
entry.summary: Congratulations to George Dasoulas, our incoming postdoctoral fellow, on being named the 2022 Wojcicki Troper HDSI Postdoctoral Fellow. We are delighted to welcome George in our group.

entry.title: New preprint on PrimeKG
entry.content: New preprint on building knowledge graphs to enable precision medicine applications.
entry.summary: New preprint on building knowledge graphs to enable precision medicine applications.

entry.title: Building KGs to Support Precision Medicine

link.title: Building KGs to Support Precision Medicine

entry.content: We created PrimeKG, a precision medicine-oriented knowledge graph to support graph AI analyses in medicine.
entry.summary: We created PrimeKG, a precision medicine-oriented knowledge graph to support graph AI analyses in medicine.

entry.title: Webster on the Cover of Cell Systems

link.title: Webster on the Cover of Cell Systems

entry.content: Webster is on the cover of April issue of Cell Systems. Webster uses cell viability changes following gene perturbation to automatically learn cellular functions and pathways from data.
entry.summary: Webster is on the cover of April issue of Cell Systems. Webster uses cell viability changes following gene perturbation to automatically learn cellular functions and pathways from data.

entry.title: NASA Space Biology
entry.content: Dr. Zitnik will serve on the Science Working Group at NASA Space Biology.
entry.summary: Dr. Zitnik will serve on the Science Working Group at NASA Space Biology.

entry.content: Yasha won the National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate (NDSEG) Fellowship. Congratulations!
entry.summary: Yasha won the National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate (NDSEG) Fellowship. Congratulations!

entry.title: AI4Science at ICML 2022
entry.content: We are excited to be selected to organize the AI4Science meeting at ICML 2022. Stay tuned for details. http://www.ai4science.net/icml22
entry.summary: We are excited to be selected to organize the AI4Science meeting at ICML 2022. Stay tuned for details. http://www.ai4science.net/icml22
